system.description:
Trigger: A [Weather] Effect the user created is removed by either expiring or due to the effect of an Attack or Ability (but not Intense Weather).

Effect: The user may use a [Weather] Attack or Ability as a Free Action at [Interrupt 3], if able. If the cancelling effect and its source lack [Legendary], the source creature gains @Affliction[suppressed] 5 and the source Attack/Ability is @Affliction[disabled] 5 or @Affliction[nullified] 5.
